catalog_script_client.name: onchange amount

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Travel Request">00037b6b47b2021005303b12d16d43f4</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:22f420054787021036c69e20116d4369</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onchange amount</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == 'no') {
        return;
    }
    g_form.setValue('quantity_updated', false);

    //Need to set a timeout because MRVS is not readable directly.
    setTimeout(function() {
        var mrvsRows = g_form.getValue("flight_details");
        var oMrvs = JSON.parse(mrvsRows);
        var total_quantity = 0;
        for (var i in oMrvs) {
            total_quantity += parseFloat(oMrvs[i].allowance);
        }

        g_form.setValue("total_allowance", total_quantity);

    }, 500);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 13:07:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>72f62c854787021036c69e20116d43e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onchange amount</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Travel Request" source="x_1196900_travel_0">a0b497e74732021005303b12d16d43d6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Travel Request">a0b497e74732021005303b12d16d43d6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_72f62c854787021036c69e20116d43e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-25 13:12:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
